Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: (-) WNL w/ no acute findings suggestive of ICB

observation.value: (-) WNL w/ no acute findings suggestive of ICB

td.content: s:65 YO white female retired presents via EMS 1 day following MVA. she was struck while passing through intersection, and sustained injury to the front of the head. Striking vehicle traveling at estimated 30 mph on impact. pt c/o moderate nausea, moderate neck pain, mild blurred vision and Traumatic Injury - Blunt. o:Height 66 in, Weight 205 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 94, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15, CT Head (-) WNL w/ no acute findings suggestive of ICB, ImPACT test Verbal Memory=71,Visual Memory=51,Processing Speed=23.8,Reaction Time=0.75, Eyes = normal pupillary reflex, NAD, Neck = supple w/o TTP, Neuro = CN II-XII WNL w/ no deficits, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Psych = Mood, affect NL, appropriate judgement a:TBI (concussion) p:administered Flexeril - 10 mg po q 8 hrs PRN pain/cramps, performed CT Head, ImPACT test, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed, and ordered rest, and referred patient to family practice/primary care.

td.content: s:white f retired aged 65 yrs returns for f/u approx. one (1) week s/p concussion. denies blurred vision, nausea and neck pain. First 24-hour hourly checks were without incident. o:Height 65 in, Weight 201 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14, ImPACT test Verbal Memory=96,Visual Memory=95,Processing Speed=44,Reaction Time=0.48, HEENT = NCAT, PERRL, C/V = RRR, Abd = Soft, ND, NTTP. BS WNL, Neuro = CN II-XII WNL. No deficits, Neck = Supple, Pulm = CTAB. Good respiratory effort, MS = Extremities x 4 WNL. Strength 5/5, Eyes = normal pupillary reflex a:S/P Concussion (with no loss of consciousness). No sequelae p:performed ImPACT test, and performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed.
